simplesect.title: Xlib Compose Keys for zh_HK.big5
simplesect.para: Applications using Xlib input handling should recognize these compose key sequences in locales using the zh_HK.big5 compose table.

zh_HK.big5 Compose Sequence Sequence Definition This file currently has no entries. It appears that a compose file (even just an empty one) is required for the appropriate keysyms to work for this encoding. <Multi_key> Means <Compose> Special Character

para.emphasis: This compose table defines no sequences of its own.
